Sheronde Glover is the CEO of The Business Practitioner (formerly Glover Enterprise), Inc., an Atlanta based consulting and training company.
Sheronde Glover is a business strategist, speaker, and tennis enthusiast who works with CEOs, leaders organizations and their teams.
